name: Find Em All! Hidden 3D Objects
description:
Are you ready to challenge yourself? Find Em All! Hidden 3D Objects will fulfill your needs with finding object mechanics to not only relax your brain but also sharp the skills of your hands and eyes. There are tons of new challenges in this pair-matching puzzle game waiting for you!

Play now and enjoy the challenging and fun gameplay with millions of objects to solve. Complete the different missions set at the beginning of each level and master the challenges.

Enjoy your time and train your brain in this find 3d puzzle game.

An exciting adventure is calling you! It’s time to relax!


KEY FEATURES:

- Hundreds of well-designed challenging levels: Cute Animals, Fresh Fruits, Delicious Cakes, Beautiful Flowers, Cool Vehicles , Lovely Toys, etc. and much more! Each items varies from one another. Feel fresh everyday!
- Smoothing sounds and gorgeous 3D visual effects. Each of you will have an enjoyable experience with the game.
- 7 powerful boosters to facilitate your gameplay.
- A game that can be enjoyed by all ages!

The game has tons of well-designed levels to train your brain, exercise your logical thinking and memory. It is the best time killer for you!

Try our Find Em All! and become the finder masters!


HOW TO PLAY:

- Find the cute 3D objects that are required in the task
- Tap and drag different items to collect them
- Drag them one by one to the track below
- After you find all items, you win and get the stars reward. More rewards as you are faster. If you finish a level quickly enough, you will get more stars
- Complete the different missions and win great reward
- NOTE: Drag all the items within the limited time! Keep an eye on the timer when connecting.
- Powerful boosters that will help you get past those tricky levels
- Each level items would be change randomly, please enjoy it!

Looking for online and offline match great 3D games? Then Find Em All! is just what you need! Come to try this challenging puzzle game.

Enjoy a nice playing time, use it to train your logic or relax after a busy and stressful day. Either way it’s always a good challenge and fun. Download the app now to join millions of players worldwide.

It is the best way for you to relax and have fun, wow!

It’s easy just to pick up and play! So, what are you waiting for? Download for free today and join the fun!

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us: support@lihuhugames.com
